alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sheridan County through 430 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westby, or 21 miles east of Plentywood. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westby and Comertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
